mapper.update:
update tra_touris_catel_rel
tourist_id = #{touristId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
food_id = #{foodId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tra_touris_catel_rel set tourist_id = #{touristId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, food_id = #{foodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status_id = #{statusId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.order_id, t.tourist_id, u.tourist_nickname, t.food_id, s.food_name, t.order_date, t.order_num, t.status_id from tra_touris_catel_rel t ,tra_foods s ,tra_tourist u where t.tourist_id=u.tourist_id and t.food_id=s.food_id
